title: Someday you'll find her, Charlie Brown. It's your first kiss, Charlie Brown.
brief_description: In “Someday you’ll find her, Charlie Brown”, Charlie becomes captivated by a beautiful girl on television. Despite Linus’ opinion that Charlie falls in love every week, he agrees to help Charlie in his mission. After many false leads and a property protected by a fierce cat, they finally track her down, only to discover she has more in common with Linus who promptly falls in love with her also. Featuring the voices of Grant Wehr, Melissa Strawmeyer, Jennifer Gaffin and Earl Reilly. Produced by Lee Mendelson and Bill Melendez. In “It’s your first kiss, Charlie Brown”, Charlie and Linus act as the queen’s attendants and Charlie is scared about the prospect of having to kiss Heather, the ‘little red-headed girl’ and homecoming queen. Featuring the voices of Arrin Skelley, Michelle Muller, Laura Planting, Ronald Hendrix and Daniel Anderson. Produced by Bill Melendez.
